title: Create AI Assistant
confirm_close_description: Your entered content will not be saved
intro_description: An Agent is your personal AI assistant that works according to your specifications to handle specific types of tasks. This wizard helps you quickly create an agent tailored to your needs.
intro_when_to_create: When should you create a new agent?
intro_scenario_1: When you have repetitive tasks that need AI assistance (e.g., writing reports, replying to emails)
intro_scenario_2: When you need AI to output content in a specific format or style
intro_scenario_3: When you want a dedicated assistant for handling certain types of tasks
q1_purpose: What would you like your AI assistant to help you with?
q1_hint: Describe the tasks you need help with in your daily work
q1_placeholder: e.g., Help me write weekly reports, reply to customer emails, summarize meeting notes...
q2_hint: Such as language style, format requirements, things to note, etc.
q2_placeholder: e.g., Keep it brief, use formal language, include bullet points...
followup_description: To help you better, I'd like to know a few more details
followup_complete: Got it! I understand your needs now.
analyzing: Finding the best setup for you...
shell_hint: We've recommended the best option based on your needs - usually no changes needed
model_hint: We've recommended a suitable model for you
no_models_available: No models available. Please contact your administrator.
loading_patience_hint: AI is working hard, please wait
preview_hint: Review the setup below - you can make changes if needed
system_prompt_hint: These instructions tell the AI how to work - usually no changes needed
bind_mode_hint: Choose where to use this assistant
confirm_hint: Click Create when everything looks good
ready_to_create_hint: Click the button below to create your assistant. You can start using it right away!
purpose_required: Please tell us what you'd like help with
name_required: Please give your assistant a name
wizard_button_tooltip: Create your AI assistant in a few simple steps
shell_type_chat_desc: Great for Q&A, writing, and organizing information
shell_type_claudecode_desc: Great for writing code and technical work
shell_type_agno_desc: Great for tasks that need multiple steps
test_hint: Switch to the 'Test It Out' tab to try your assistant with a sample task
test_empty_hint: Enter a task below to see how your assistant responds
test_input_placeholder: e.g., Help me write a summary of this week's work...
iterate_hint: Not happy with the response? Tell me what to change and I'll improve the prompt
iterate_placeholder: e.g., The response is too long, I'd like it more concise...
iterate_need_test_first: Please test the prompt first before iterating
preview_adjust_hint: Send a real task to see how your assistant responds. If you're not satisfied, tell me how to improve it.
preview_adjust_empty_hint: Click send to see AI response with test data, or use your own task to test.
preview_adjust_input_label: Send a task to your assistant
preview_adjust_input_placeholder: e.g., Help me write a summary of this week's work...
preview_adjust_iterate_hint: Tell me how you'd like the assistant to improve, and I'll optimize the prompt
prompt_preview_hint: Review the generated prompt and configuration - you can make changes if needed
additional_thoughts_placeholder: If you have other thoughts or requirements, you can add them here...
additional_thoughts_hint: Optional: Add any thoughts or needs beyond the AI's questions
try_new_prompt: Send a new message to try the optimized prompt
select_text_hint: Select text from AI response to quote
